intent_atoms.description: Publish ISOInspector app manual with onboarding, navigation, and persistence guidance for the SwiftUI shell.
Author CLI manual covering global options plus inspect, validate, export, and batch commands with troubleshooting tips.
Execution trackers updated to mark F4 complete and reference new manuals.
Markdown files validated using python3 scripts/fix_markdown.py and npx markdownlint-cli2 on specified directories.
Capture platform-specific screenshots to accompany the manuals when assets become available.
Document diagnostics-driven persistence troubleshooting once logging pipeline surfaces signals.
